Articles.Content:
You know that red squiggly line under your text? Love the way it fails to correct your sentences?

Type sentences in this thread completely wrong, then use the spelling correction to find the funniest replacement words :

Ex

tht kool thig iz awesum

After

thy pool thigh oz awestruck

dat weegee so much epicnesses

fat weekly so much creepinesses

yeesh dis ish su uwuserm!

yeasty dis dish us username!

yesh, I has teh kerbal spac progrm! MOAR Boostir!

mesh, I has tea verbal spa program! MOAT Boo-stir!

wwsh iss thnikes huf jofes byidle

wash ids ethnics hug Josef by-idel

wegei da bess playah heare

weighed dad beds playability hearse

YESH I ISH teh bess plyer of kerbal spac program.

MESH I FISH tech beds pryer of kerbal sac program.

Mah Arghms ar weekz fmro ressing spabe barr

Maj Argus at weeny faro dressing spade bare

Mai sig ish awshurm!

Mao sig his Washburn!

i iz the moast epaics of aweeeellllll plaaaaaaayers

i oz the moats epics of weedkiller playfulness

uye, i niidz to phinde ay prpl kow

use i Nimrod to philanderer aye propyl wok

I duon geht diz threed atall

I duos gent ditz threes atoll

I amm the slaisskoestes sof scielsilosko

I mam the slavishness sod Scientology

Teh Tre Miel Hor Kar iz awesum!

Tet Treo Riel Horn Kari oz awestruck!

I i mama theh vernes julend fier teh koukiez

I would like a mint julep for the kookie.

wat. iPhones are good at this.

Ai ish totalleys awsherm!

Ami fish tot-alleys Hermosa!

I wuf teh bunneas.

I wolf tech bleu cheese.
